evidence.claim: Standards Care adheres to HIPAA compliance for secure handling of healthcare data.
The company utilizes FHIR standards for interoperable healthcare data exchange.
HL7 protocols are implemented for data interchange in healthcare applications.
Standards Care Ltd's integration with EHRs supports seamless patient data flow.
The organization engages with approved clearinghouses for electronic claims processing compliant with X12.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transactions or relevant API automation use cases found.
